data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Mound, L. A. (2015): Genera of the Scirtothrips genus-group (Thysanoptera, Thripidae) with a new species of Siamothrips from Malaysia. Zootaxa 4021 (2): 387-394, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4021.2.9
